title: Font ID please
content:
Hi guys,

looking to see if anyone knows what this font could be?

Also any other similar fonts like this one that you would see in some 1950s advertising posters.

Thanks very much

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Give away.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023222318/http:/typophile.com/files/Give%20away.jpg) | 59.13 KB |
author: Joe90

comments.content:
House Brush from Sign Painter Font Kit.

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023222318/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit")
Fast replies, thanks very much guys!
